programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow S2 - EP 14
programme.desc: The Legends learn where the last fragment of the Spear of Destiny is hidden when they track Commander Steel to NASA Headquarters in 1970.

programme.title: Shark - EP 2
programme.desc: A major wildlife series on the sharks of the world with over thirty species filmed, showing how they hunt, intricate social lives, courtship, growing up and the threats they face.

programme.title: Whacked Out Sports - EP 2
programme.desc: This series features sports mishaps, crashes and bloopers from all around the world.

programme.title: Nigella At My Table - EP 2
programme.desc: In her latest series, Nigella Lawson shares the food she cooks for family and friends. Whether offering up her fresh take on familiar classics, or creating new dishes inspired by different cuisines, Nigella ensures that everyday eating is always pleasurable, with a minimum of fuss.

programme.title: The Ellen DeGeneres Show 17 - EP 46
programme.desc: (Encore) Ellen welcomes Matt Damon ("Ford v Ferrari").

programme.title: Zoom Zim Zam S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: Join Zoom, Zim and Zam, superheroes with superpowers, as they take you around the alphabet galaxy and teach you a different alphabet everyday. Today's alphabet is E. Our superheroes attempt to solve the emergency on Planet E.

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger - EP 10
programme.desc: A honey bee drops in on Leo's picnic. The Junior Rangers buzz down to the forest to guide the honey bee back to its beehive, but an encounter with some wasps could prove too much for the Junior Rangers to handle. A baby bottlenose dolphin is the last animal Leo expects to see in his garden pond. But when the unexpectable happens, the Junior Rangers start on an expedition to find the dolphin's mother.

programme.title: Franklin And Friends - EP 52
programme.desc: Franklin joins his familiar friends, Bear, Fox, Rabbit and the rest of the bunch, in new adventures in Woodland.

programme.title: Kate & Mim-Mim S2 - EP 20
programme.desc: Kate and her stuffed toy friends use their imaginations to go on wild and incredible adventures.

programme.title: Hi-5 S17 - EP 5
programme.desc: Iconic children's pop group Hi-5 continues to teach kids about animals, colours, music and more.

programme.title: Hi-5 S17 - EP 6
programme.desc: Iconic children's pop group Hi-5 continues to teach kids about animals, colours, music and more.

programme.title: Transformers Cyberverse - EP 15
programme.desc: When Bumblebee can't remember what his current mission on Earth is, Windblade repairs his memory chips, enabling him to rediscover his past adventures on Cybertron. When his memories are being repaired, Bumblebee gets a clue that will lead both him and Windblade to complete their mission and save their friends, unaware that a team of Decepticons are tracking them too!

programme.title: Kody Kapow S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: Kody Kapow is about an aspiring martial arts-style superhero named Kody who spends the summer with his extended family in a small village in China. His grandfather, a martial arts master, teaches Kody ancient lessons of mindfulness, patience and perseverance, which Kody employs as he and his super spy cousin Mei set off on adventures in the village together with their tiger friend Goji.

programme.title: Sonic Boom S2 - EP 5

Youbao and Shuixian unwillingly decide to send Yueman to a mental institution. (重)月满见水仙抱着她的孩子，追打水仙，要将孩子抢回来。水仙抱着孩子逃跑，狼狈不堪，幸好友宝出现，将月满制服。两人见月满因失去伟南而精神错乱，深感痛心，虽然心中不舍，还是决定将月满送往精神病院治疗。.

(PG13-部分画面令人不安)(重)唐瑄亚承认自己是吴作峰的情人，而且是她教吴作峰用记忆宫殿训练法增强记忆力，间接害死吴作峰。徐朗觉得吴作峰的性格强硬，不可能被唐瑄亚控制，于是怀疑唐瑄亚为了保护某人而撒谎。.

programme.desc: (R) Based on Louis Cha's classic swordplay novel, this lavish production stars Taiwanese heartthrob Ma Jing Tao as a legendary swordsman and TCS top actress Fann Wong as his love interest. The story centres around a pugilistic manual known as the Sunflower Scripture. Its sudden disappearance leads to bloodshed and death-defying encounters for swordsman Ling Hu Chong. (重)《笑傲江湖》是改编自武侠巨作金庸的原著，由霍志揩执导，马景涛、范文芳等主演的古装电视剧。该剧讲述了华山弟子令狐冲（马景涛饰）为了替师父寻找秘籍《葵花宝典》，而从此卷入江湖争斗。.

programme.title: 哆啦A梦 New Doraemon - EP 10
programme.desc: This animation series centres on a robotic cat from the future, Doraemon. With its various magical gadgets, Doraemon helps its master solve all kinds of problems. 在这系列卡通动画里，小朋友们将看到哆啦A梦 - 这只来自未来世界的机器猫，如何应用它的法宝，协助其主人大雄解决生活上的各种难题。.

programme.title: 数学荒岛历险记 S4 Math's Island S4 - EP 7
programme.desc: In this new series, Luke and his buddies met a new friend, CODEMAO. They help the residents of the town to solve their problems using the power of programming and mathematics, and the use of intelligence technology changes their lives. 在这新系列,故事讲述罗克和小伙伴们遇到了新的朋友编程猫，大家一起帮助小镇的居民们，使用编程和数学的力量解决问题，让小镇越来越智能化，智能科技改变了人们的生活。.

programme.title: 玩具不插电 Toys Unplugged - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) In this episode, the hosts demonstrate how to spin a top and trundle a hoop. They are at the stable to experience the joy of horse riding and also learn more about horses. They also invite yo-yo players to demonstrate the interesting yo-yo skills. The hosts also introduce how mighty beanz are made. (重)这一集，主持人将示范陀螺及滚铁圈的玩法！接着前往马场，除了体验骑马的快感之外，他们也对马有更深入的了解。此外，他们还请来溜溜球玩家，为大伙儿示范精彩的溜溜球技巧！最后，主持人也为大家介绍跳跳豆的做法！.

programme.title: 聚爱圆梦 The Wish - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Meet the Lees - a couple who had their lives changed forever by a tragic accident. Now paralysed, Lee Hee Heng relies completely on his wife to care for him. The family needs help to fulfil Hee Heng's wish, but they must overcome the challenge of cleaning up their cluttered home. All is not lost! Follow The Wish team as they help the Lees transform their living space. (重)李氏夫妇因一场不幸事故而永远改变了他们的生活。李喜敬现在瘫痪了，得完全依靠妻子照顾他。 喜敬的家人需要援助以实现喜敬的愿望，但他们得先接受杂乱的住家打扫清洁的挑战！让我们看 "聚爱圆梦" 团队如何帮助李氏夫妇改变他们的生活空间。.

programme.title: 一家之宝 Our Family Joy - EP 4

Together, they plan for a fun-filled beach staycation, packed with outdoor activities, to surprise their parents. (重)热恋中的李腾来到演艺圈模范夫妻林明伦和陈毓芸的家，体验他们的日常生活，并向他们讨教维持幸福婚姻的秘诀。李腾也带着4个孩子一起密谋策划Staycation，希望让一家6口有一个甜蜜美好的回忆。古灵精怪的孩子们会想出什么天马星空的点子，给父母一个难忘的惊喜呢？.

programme.title: 星光灿烂 The Glittering Days - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Xu Wen Hui is a popular singer who was forced to take part in all sorts of singing competition by her adopted father, Jin Long. He treats Wen Hui like a money making machine. programme.title: 午餐吃什么? What's For Lunch? - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) On the first episode of "What's For Lunch?", first up Zoe Tay and Kym Ng will be recommending a famous Teochew porridge stall with over 60 years of history till date. What won them over with this simple lunch and which dishes are their favourites? Next up, Lee Teng will be taking the hosts to a toys-themed restaurant that serves Western food. What's so special about this restaurant, and what will Lee Teng recommend as must try on the menu? Watch to find out and get some lunch inspirations! (重)戏剧组阿姐郑惠玉和综艺组阿姐鐘琴首次介绍大家午餐吃什么的好去处！两位潮州阿姐推荐的这个潮州粥已经有60多年的历史，到底有哪些菜色是必点的呢？清粥小菜如何虏获两位阿姐的心？而节目的下半场，李腾带大家去的西式主题餐厅，有玩具也有美食，有什么食物值得品尝？一集节目结合了多种美食，绝对能让观众大饱眼福！.

programme.title: 第一主角 The Lead - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Deping cannot believe Anya was accepted instead of the prettier Ah Zhen. Guanghui points to the relationship Anya's father, Guodong, has with Xinghai, the head of Chinese drama unit. Guanghui offers to give his place up to Ah Zhen. She turns him down. Xiaohu asks the director for a substitute for Xiangrong when he notices she is unwell. At the director's insistence, however, Xiangrong attempts to execute the wire-suspension stunt herself. (PG)(重)光辉拿到有对白的咖喱菲角色，阿真积极帮他彩排，过程中她发现自己喜欢光辉。阿真发现光辉拍戏忘记带剧本，担心他被导演骂，急忙把剧本拿给安雅要她转交。安雅将功劳占为己有，阿真发现原来安雅也喜欢光辉。.

programme.title: 第一主角 The Lead - EP 4

programme.title: 春花望露 Spring Flower - EP 455
programme.desc: Youchun has concerns about Jincheng's safety when he failed to answer a long distance call. In the meantime, Meihui eventually agrees to let Jiahui return to the Chen Hospital. Junnan feels grateful. (PG)有纯打电话给身处国外的金城聊心事，电话却没人接听，有纯心里有点担心。其间，美惠终于答应让家辉回返陈综合医院工作，俊男欣然。.

programme.title: 前线追踪 Frontline - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Facing a spike in migrant workers infected by Covid-19 recently, inter-agency taskforce "Forward Assurance and Support Teams" (FAST) were deployed into foreign workers dormitories to tackle this situation. (重)最近，本地受感染的客工人数不断增加，使到客工宿舍的疫情倍受关注。政府派遣了“前线保障志愿小组”到各大小宿舍了解情况。客工居住的宿舍环境有什么改善？宿舍管理层和客工们怎么互相合作，遏制疫情在宿舍中散播？本地社工组织怎么保障社工的福利和身心健康？.

programme.title: 醉玲珑 Lost Love In Times - EP 14
programme.desc: (R) Qingchen successfully entered Sky Dance Brothel in a disguise. Qingchen said to Pingting that the Sacred Sorceress clan has been destroyed and only Dark Sorceress can rebuild the Sacred Sorceress clan. Pingting hired Qingchen and she settled in the Brothel. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)卿尘乔装打扮来到了天舞醉坊寻找坊主，武聘婷。卿尘淡定地吹捧了一番碧血阁和暗巫的强大，她指出只有暗巫一脉才能光复巫族。武聘婷让她化名文清，入驻天舞醉坊为自己效力。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 376
programme.desc: hu-Tsai, Chao and his wife have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's invention dream, the Chao brother's lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 我的左邻右里 Dear Neighbours - EP 19
programme.desc: (R) Blossom pretends that she is pregnant and asks Jia Hong for money, forcing Jia Hong to rob. Shu Juan and Xiao Long want Jia Hong to bring Blossom to meet them. Shu Juan exposes that Blossom is not pregnant, and that she wants to cheat Jia Hong's money. Blossom's motives are exposed, and in a fit of anger, she breaks up with Jia Hong. Jia Hong is heartbroken, and he takes his anger out on Shu Juan, as he is unhappy that she has broken them up. (PG)(重) Blossom假借怀孕向嘉鸿要钱，逼得嘉鸿去抢劫，淑娟和小龙要嘉鸿带Blossom来见面。淑娟向Blossom套话，揭穿她根本没有怀孕，只是要骗嘉鸿的钱。Blossom计谋被拆穿，恼羞成怒，当场把嘉鸿甩了，拂袖而去。嘉鸿心碎，迁怒淑娟，不满淑娟拆散他们。.

programme.title: 狮城有约 Hello Singapore - EP 19
programme.desc: (Live) Delivering the day's latest news and social features that matter to you. Every Monday to Friday, from 6.30pm to 7.30pm on Channel 8. （现场直播）总结一天大小事，关心属于你我的家园。每逢星期一至五，傍晚6.30-7.30pm，与你相约！.

programme.title: 白色强人 Big White Duel - EP 15
programme.desc: (Part 1) Zoe shows symptoms of fever and cough. Tang Ming senses something wrong and tries to enter the ER by force to take care of Zoe. Zhanshen and Kennis attempt to stop him but to no avail. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(第15集上) 苏怡出现发烧及咳嗽症状。唐明察觉有异，强行要求入急症室照顾苏怡。湛琛和洛雯阻止不果。.

programme.title: 詹姆士出走料理 James' Going Places - EP 4
programme.desc: Join James, the host with outstanding culinary skills and an appetite for good food, as he explores markets and savours local delicacies. He will also showcase new cooking methods, and eventually present a creative dish. 什么？细菌也能作出美味好吃的料理？！没错！那就是经由发酵过程中所产生的红曲、酒酿、酱油、荫油等调味酱，所料理出来的美味食物！詹姆士本着追根究柢的职人精神，带大家去挖掘这些发酵达人的惊人祕诀，让观众在家里也能作出好吃的细菌料理。另外，还带大家去品尝从未吃过的酒酿水果、以及一百年的冰棒喔！.

programme.title: 单翼天使 My Guardian Angels - EP 16
programme.desc: Jia Qi receives a call, telling her that her mother got into a car accident. Hoping to get to the scene as soon as possible, but unable to get a taxi, she asks Dong Yu for help. Upon arrival, Jia Qi was devastated to find out that her mother had already passed away. Jia Qi feels worse after finding out that her mother got into the accident while helping Jia Qi get her costume. Dong Yu comforts her. (PG-部分画面令人不安)佳琪接到电话，得知母亲出车祸，想尽快赶去，却截不到德士，向东宇求助。两人赶到车祸地点，母亲却已去世，佳琪悲恸不已，还得知妈妈是为了帮她拿表演衣服才出事的，更感自责，东宇安慰陪伴。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news. 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 罪案心理小组X Visible Lies - EP 16
programme.desc: Genius student Xu Lang (Zhang Chao) who specializes in Criminal Psychology returns to China and joins the public security bureau but is severely injured and even loses his younger brother while solving a case. Seven years later, Xu Lang is the youngest professor of Criminology at the National Police University. Then, his friend Tang Sen (Leon Lee) invites him to return to the field and help out their newly established "Criminal Psychology Team X". (PG13-部分画面令人不安)犯罪学教授徐朗加入罪案心理小组，第一宗负责的案子就是一宗挖心案。死者是一名网络作家，死亡时间跟另一名网络作家接近，而且两名死者互相认识。.

programme.title: 巨轮II Brother's Keeper S2 - EP 34
programme.desc: (R) Tianjiu's illegal gambling dens are raided by the Police; he confronts Xianbo when he discovers Xianbo had tipped off the police about his illegal business. Xianbo is arrested when he accidentally injured Tianjiu's bodyguard during a scuffle. Ma Wentai recaptures Meihua and Nana and both are beaten up by Tianjiu. Meihua bribes Ma Wentai to let them off. (PG13-性相关语)(重)天鹫的网上赌场被警方扫荡，他猜是先柏所为，跟他打起来。 二人在一场激烈打斗中，先柏无意刺伤天鹫的保镳。而被马文泰抓回的美华与娜娜，受天鹫毒打，美华买通马文泰，求他放走她们。.

programme.title: 武神赵子龙 Chinese Hero Zhao Zilong - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Zhao Zilong and Liu Shen ask Li Quan to teach them martial arts. Li Quan agrees, on condition that Zilong is able to withstand three powerful hitting strikes from him. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)赵子龙与柳慎恳求李全教他们武功，李全表示愿意，条件是子龙必须能够接得了他的三招。.

(重)《超凡魔术师》是出自中国的综艺节目。节目采取了“万里挑一"的赛制。此外节目还邀请到了好莱坞和魔术届最强的幕后班底。.

programme.title: 118 S2 - EP 114
programme.desc: (R) Man Man prepares a "farewell" dinner for Hong Tian Pao. Ji Zhou feels that Man Man's actions are overboard and fights for Hong Tian Pao's justice. (PG)(重)慢慢给轰天炮饯行，准备了三蛋一汤的全蛋餐，希望轰天炮吃了全蛋餐后乖乖"滚蛋"。际洲觉得慢慢很过分，为轰天炮抱不平。轰天炮离别在即，心情郁闷，躲在后楼梯喝酒，际洲无意中发现铁汉也有落泪的时候。.

programme.title: 搜密.打卡.小红点 Little Red Dot Detectives - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Joo Chiat and Katong are known for its rich Peranakan culture and heritage, however there are many unknown gems in this area! Do you know what has Joo Chiat's old police transformed into? You can also discover a rainbow tree hidden in Katong Park! Come along with our hosts to uncover exciting secrets in Joo Chiat and Katong! (重)如切和加东是一个充满娘惹色彩的地区，但除了传统店屋和娘惹服装，这里还隐藏很多你不知道的事物！二战前的如切警察局如今变成什么呢？而在加东公园里，还有一颗彩虹树！想知道更多？就跟着我们搜密组员一起发掘精彩的如切和加东吧！.

programme.desc: (R) Xi Yue sleeps with Yu Jie after getting drunk. Feeling regretful, she quickly goes back home. Yan Xun apologises to Xi Yue that he is unable to celebrate their wedding anniversary. He gives her a gift, and informs her that he will be going overseas to work. Xi Yue becomes emotional. Fortuitously, he saves Shengzhu from a masked man trying to kill her. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)胜珠的弟弟胜泰与妈妈瞒着胜珠，偷偷跑去看姑姑送给胜珠的山地。他们打算赶走住在山里的村民，以做度假村的投资。当作斗知道这个消息和得知地主是胜珠后，立刻下山去找胜珠商量让他继续居住的事，却凑巧救了差点遭蒙面男人杀害的胜珠。.

A sixth of acid burns victims in Cambodia were innocent children, whose lives were scarred forever. Can they break free from the seemingly bleak and agonizing future? programme.title: Cemburu Seorang Perempuan - EP 13
programme.desc: Zik is married to Erni, the love of his life. After a miscarriage that causes Erni to be infertile, Erni asked Zik to marry Dhiya, his best friend, so she can be the surrogate mother to their children. However, Erni becomes more jealous of her sister wife and starts to turn into a monster and plans to get rid of Diya in the most horrible way possible. programme.title: My Coffee Prince - EP 15
programme.desc: Adapted from Korea's most popular drama series, Coffee Prince tell the story of four young people who meet together at a cafe as they navigate through love, life and their dreams.Raikal is a smart young man who hates the idea of being tied down to one career. Reluctant to join the family business, he is ordered by his grandmother to manage a cafe. Though reluctant to run the cafe, he slowly begins to immerse himself in the gourmet coffee business. After her return to the café, Dani's relationship with Raikal becomes close. But things take a turn when she sees Raikal with Mariam in an intimate situation and this makes her jealous. To release her unconditional feeling, she reveals to Raikal that she really like him.

programme.title: Atin, Atan & Mak Cun - EP 21
programme.desc: Mak Cun is going to Guangzhou, China to promote her products. While she is away, Kuntum who is back in town after 12 years in Saudi Arabia, take care of Atin and Atan. Atin helps her friends in their studies but she is disappointed when she is not selected as the Top Student. Then Atul and Fitri came back but Atan does not like Fitri because he spend his time with gadgets and speaks English. Can Mak Cun penetrates China's market and can Atin outdo Feng Yin as the top student? The boys are dressed up in traditional costume in the village before the circumcision ceremony. Atun comes back to witness Fiktri going through his circumcision session.

programme.desc: Maintaining the MANJA branding, the content encompasses guest interviews, fashion, food, games-challenges and more. The format is VT and Live in studio. Each episode carries a specific theme which will thread the segments together. The five key segments are Tamu Minggu Ini (Chat with studio guests), Estetika (Beauty, Styling, Interior Design), Holistik (DIY, Life hacks), Makan Tiub (Food) and Bro-Sis Cuba (Activities). Spotlight (Local Entertainment Highlights will supplement these main segm The lifestyle magazine programme known for spreading good vibes on Monday night is back for its fifth season. Maintaining the Manja branding, the content encompasses chats in the studios with guests from various background, surfacing interesting topics surrounding Singapore’s fashion, food and new spots. The chat show will be helmed by three of its original hosts – Syirah Jusnim Lydia Asyiqin and Hans Hamid, with an addition Fadhli Abdullah.

programme.title: Skuad Cilik 2 - EP 2

programme.title: Berita Tengah Malam
programme.desc: Berita Tengah Malam yang memaparkan perkembangan terkini, isu-isu semasa dalam dan luar negara.

programme.title: Smart Parents
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan motivasi TV yang akan membincangkan tentang tips ibu-bapa bijak anak hebat. Episod kali ini membincangkan topik 'Biar Kita di Kata Berlembut Asalkan Anak-Anak Sentiasa Ikut' bersama hos Zaid Mohamad.

programme.title: Bakul Telur Emas
programme.desc: Bakul Telur Emas pada minggu ini membincangkan tentang topik Payung Sebelum Ribut bersama Hanis Zulkefli seorang Pakar Perunding Kewangan.

programme.title: Al Mulki Nusantara
programme.desc: Al-Mulki Nusantara episod ini menceritakan tentang Kerajaan Barus.

programme.title: Doktor Pokok
programme.desc: Doktor Pokok adalah sebuah rancangan yang bertemakan Kenali Penyakit Pelihara Tanaman yang dihoskan oleh Heliza Helmi.

programme.title: Cina Muslim Malaysia
programme.desc: Dihoskan oleh Iswan Ismail, episod kali ini menjejaki tokoh-tokoh Cina Muslim Malaysia yang berjaya dalam bidang masing-masing. Antara tokoh yang diwawancara ialah Datuk Dr. Fadzli Cheah (Pakar Bedah), Adam Corrie (Pelakon) dan Datuk Mohd Chan Abdullah (Pemilik Restoran).

programme.title: Psikosis
programme.desc: Psikosis adalah sebuah rancangan yang memaparkan kisah, pengalaman dan rawatan tentang pelbagai penyakit mental bersama hos Aiman Amri. Psikosis pada minggu ini mengenali dengan lebih dekat mengenai Gejala Kemurungan (MDD).

programme.title: Langit Borneo
programme.desc: Langit Borneo pada episod kali ini memaparkan kepada anda keunikan bangunan dan infrastruktur di Wilayah Borneo.

programme.title: Legenda Seni
programme.desc: Program yang memaparkan kehidupan tokoh seni tanah air yang dihoskan oleh Sabhi Saddi.

programme.title: Terbaik Dari Ladang (Siri 2)
programme.desc: Bersama Alif Hadi ke ladang perusahaan kayu manis milik En Asnin dan perkongsian resepi Sup Buntui.

programme.title: 3P
programme.desc: Jom! Menyelami dan kenali perkerjaan yang luar biasa Bersama Baki Zainal.

programme.title: Dimensi Cergas
programme.desc: Bersama Nana Al-Haleq (Jurulatih Kecergasan) untuk menunjukkan jenis senaman dengan menggunakan wearable technology untuk meningkatkan tahap kecergasan.

programme.title: Refleksi Aktif
programme.desc: Bersama hos Fariha Razak menyelami latihan-latihan yang dilaksanakan oleh atlet-atlet berprestasi tinggi dalam meningkatkan prestasi mereka.

programme.title: Santri Serumpun
programme.desc: Program kembara ke Pusat-Pusat Pengajian Agama di Indonesia.

programme.title: Berita Pagi
programme.desc: Membawa berita-berita menyeluruh dan terkini di seluruh Malaysia khas untuk anda.

programme.title: Berita Pagi Sabah
programme.desc: Saksikan berita pagi dari Sabah yang memaparkan perkembangan terkini serta isu-isu semasa.

programme.title: Berita Pagi Sarawak
programme.desc: Saksikan Berita Pagi Sarawak memaparkan perkembangan terkini, isu-isu semasa dalam dan luar negara.

programme.title: Selamat Pagi Malaysia
programme.desc: Rancangan yang memaparkan segmen perbincangan bersama panel jemputan seperti Topik Semasa, Info Semasa, Doktor dan Anda, Pendidikan, Filem Kita dan Wanita.

programme.title: Berita Mandarin
programme.desc: Saksikan berita bahasa Mandarin yang memaparkan perkembangan terkini, isu-isu semasa dalam dan luar negara.

programme.title: World Around US

programme.title: Berita Tengah Hari

programme.title: Sfera
programme.desc: Rancangan pertanian berbentuk info yang memberikan pelbagai maklumat dan ilmu dalam bidang teknologi, pendidikan, perniagaan dan sains yang terkini.

programme.title: Pastikan Sahih
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan bual bicara santai untuk berkongsi maklumat yang benar dan membetulkan berita-berita palsu yang viral dalam media social.

programme.title: M-Smart
programme.desc: Episod kali ini M-Smart memaparkan kursus-kursus yang ditawarkan dalam industri multimedia kreatif iaitu Diploma Filem dan Animasi Digital, Diploma Rekaan Grafik dan Diploma Animasi.

programme.title: Rencah Hidup
programme.desc: Rencah Hidup membawakan kisah keinsafan dari insan-insan yang pernah melakukan kesalahan. Episod ini memaparkan kisah insan yang terlibat dengan Penyalahgunaan Dadah.

programme.title: Syahadah
programme.desc: Sebuah dokumentari khas sempena bulan Ramadan yang memaparkan kisah hidup dan penghijrahan umat Islam di dalam dan di luar negara dengan membawa penonton menyelami sejarah dan perkembangan Islam di setiap destinasi persinggahan krew pengambaran.

programme.title: Sidang Media Kementerian Kesihatan Malaysia
programme.desc: Ikuti Sidang Media oleh Kementerian Kesihatan Malaysia mengenai COVID-19.

programme.title: Feminin Waja
programme.desc: Feminin Waja episod kali ini membawakan usahawan wanita Nuraizah Baharin yang membangunkan industri teknologi perisian komputer dan telefon pintar.

programme.title: Senang Rupanya
programme.desc: Bersama hos Munaa Bella membaiki paip dan membuat bingkai gambar secara DIY bersama tetamu jemputan.

programme.title: Berita Wilayah
programme.desc: Saksikan Berita Wilayah yang memaparkan berita-berita terkini dan isu-isu semasa.

programme.title: Pewaris Legasi

programme.title: Demi Negara

programme.title: Kita Malaysia

programme.desc: Full and detailed coverage of rapidly changing developments both in Japan and abroad.

programme.title: J-Flicks
programme.desc: Live narrating to silent film projections performed by a narrator called a 'benshi' is an old Japanese art form. We welcome in our studio a professional 'benshi' narrator, Ichiro Kataoka.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: Full and detailed coverage of rapidly changing developments both in Japan and abroad.

programme.title: Cool Japan
programme.desc: While chicken is eaten in many parts of the world, Japan's chicken cuisine tends to fascinate foreigners. The panelists experience Japanese chicken dishes and discuss what makes them uniquely popular.

programme.title: Ukiyoe Edo-Life
programme.desc: On those hot, humid summer nights, nothing can get in the way of sleep like mosquitoes on the hunt. We learn about the tools the Edo townspeople had at their disposal to fight the pesky insects.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: Full and detailed coverage of rapidly changing developments both in Japan and abroad.

programme.title: Anime Supernova
programme.desc: Makoto and Ayako Takano form the Kyoto-based moogabooga, a creative duo that makes stop-motion animation. Join us and learn how this married couple breathes new life into household items.

programme.title: Darwin's Amazing Animals
programme.desc: For the best babysitter, look no further than the snow monkeys of North Africa: the Barbary macaque! Young males jump at the chance to gain trust and prove their worth as full-fledged group members.

programme.title: Trails to Oishii Tokyo: Mini
programme.desc: The fermented seasoning called miso is an essential part of miso soup, a Japanese soul food. Let's find out about a traditional miso making procedure and a hidden connection with Zen training.

programme.desc: Full and detailed coverage of rapidly changing developments both in Japan and abroad.

programme.desc: Ryo Okawara is an illustrator and anime director who consistently experiments with style.

programme.title: Madrid
programme.desc: Hubertus von Hohenlohe presents the world's most exciting cities – this time, he says ¡Hola! from Madrid. In Madrid, Hubertus visits a very different type of factory: Factum Arte, where the dreams of the world's artists become reality. He also gets to know the street art collective Boa Mistura, hangs out with DJ and motorcycle racer Fonsi Nieto and more.

programme.title: Life on the Ski World Cup tour
programme.desc: Take an inside look at the FIS World Cup tour from the eyes of the greatest skiers on the planet. Go behind the scenes at 21 iconic locations of the FIS World Cup tour with personal insights from the greatest skiers on the planet competing in Downhill, Super G, Giant Slalom, Slalom and Alpine. Hear how their passion drives them to go faster.

programme.title: Chasing the record
programme.desc: Lindsey Vonn heads into the 2018 season just four wins shy of the most coveted record in skiing. Lindsey Vonn heads into the 2018 season just four wins shy of the most coveted record in skiing – 86 World Cup wins. Meanwhile, friend and competitor Sofia Goggia, fresh off a historic World Cup season, battles injury so she can return to the snow.

programme.title: Moto 7: The Movie
programme.desc: Top riders from every moto discipline come together in a film that rewrites the moto playbook. The best riders from every moto discipline assemble to push their sport to new levels. Whether it's training for the next Supercross at a high-tech training facility or combing the globe for the next freeride paradise, they live at full throttle.

programme.title: Moto 9
programme.sub-title: The world's best places for riding
programme.desc: Journey to the world's most incredible riding locations with riders who are worthy of such venues. Journey to the world's most incredible riding locations with riders who are worthy of such venues in Moto 9, the latest of the world's most progressive moto video franchise.

programme.title: Mt Etna
programme.desc: MTB team InFocus takes a unique trip to the legendary Mount Etna, one of the world's most active volcanoes. Bavarian mountain bike team InFocus shakes off the winter cobwebs with a unique trip in search of warmer riding spots. Their quest led them to the legendary Mount Etna in Sicily, one of the world's most active volcanoes.

programme.title: X Games in Barcelona
programme.desc: Kriss Kyle goes to the X Games in Barcelona, then travels to Italy to ride street with BMXer Simone Barraco. Kriss Kyle goes to the X Games in Barcelona, then travels to Italy to ride street with BMXer Simone Barraco. Following a trick-filled session, Simone invites Kriss to his hometown of Genoa to ride local spots and sample his grandma’s famous ravioli.

programme.title: BMX Adventures in Texas
programme.desc: After landing in Austin, Texas, USA Kriss Kyle finds a local tour guide in BMX legend Chase Hawk. After landing in Austin, Kriss Kyle finds a local tour guide in BMX legend Chase Hawk. In the blazing Texas heat, they tear up the city’s best spots, then cool down with some swimming and wakeskating before recording an edit with filmmaker Joe Simon.

programme.title: Once Upon A Town
programme.sub-title: A journey with graffiti artist Falko One
programme.desc: Street artist Falko One travels through South Africa, bringing art to those who need it most. The latest project from renowned graffiti artist Falko One sees him travelling through his home country of South Africa to paint homes in rural areas and bring his art to those who need it most.

programme.title: Project Acheron: Patagonia
programme.desc: Four high performance athletes push their limits as they hike, kayak and climb through spectacular terrain. Explore the physical and spiritual challenges faced by four athletes trekking through the wild terrain of Patagonia. The individual athletes undergo a transformation as they gel with former Navy SEALs to become a strong team.

programme.title: On Top Again
programme.desc: A prolific champion is determined to return stronger than ever after suffering a career-threatening injury. Prolific cliff diving champion Orlando Duque’s career is put in jeopardy when a skydiving session goes horribly wrong. After a taxing year of rehab, 'The Duke' mounts a highly anticipated comeback right in his hometown of Cali, Colombia.

programme.title: X Games Rallycross
programme.desc: Travis Pastrana and Bryce Menzies fine-tune the Dodge Dart at the Auto Club Speedway in Fontana, California. Travis Pastrana and Bryce Menzies work on fine-tuning the Dodge Dart at the Auto Club Speedway in Fontana, California. World Rally Champion Sébastien Loeb also stops by for some go-kart racing, and Travis sees world records shattered at the X Games.

programme.title: The Ultimate Race Week
programme.desc: From New Hampshire, USA, to Ontario, Canada, Travis Pastrana begins the busiest race week of the year. From New Hampshire, USA to Ontario, Canada, Travis Pastrana begins the busiest race week of the year. Then after the TORC race in Chicago, he and wife Lyn-Z catch up with the Nitro Circus tour and end the season at Dusty Wygle’s birthday bash.

programme.title: BMXing in Chicago and Denver
programme.desc: BMXer Tyler Fernengel makes a couple of stops on his way to his new home in San Diego. After a heartfelt goodbye to family and friends, Tyler Fernengel hits the road for his new home in San Diego. Along the way, he stops in Chicago for a BMX session with Brian Kachinsky, and Denver, where Mother Nature is less than welcoming.

programme.title: Welcome to San Diego
programme.desc: After a visit to Salt Lake City, Tyler Fernengel meets his new pro BMX buddies for a session in San Diego. Tyler Fernengel swings through Salt Lake City on his drive west before pushing on to San Diego. When he arrives, he meets up with fellow BMX pros Dennis Enarson and Chad Kerley to see for himself how the sessions really go down in his new town.

programme.title: Gardena Skatepark
programme.desc: Joey Brezinski and his friend 'Rip' review the amenities at the skatepark in Arthur Lee Johnson Memorial in Gardena, California. Joey Brezinski and his friend 'Rip' review the amenities at the skatepark in Arthur Lee Johnson Memorial in Gardena, California.

programme.title: The Berrics
programme.desc: Joey Brezinski and his friend 'Rip' review the amenities at The Berrics skatepark in Los Angeles, California. Joey Brezinski and his friend 'Rip' review the amenities at The Berrics indoor skatepark, which is owned by skateboard pros Steve Berra and Eric Koston and located in Los Angeles, California.

programme.title: Chevy Chase
programme.desc: Join American street skateboarder Joey Brezinski in Los Angeles, California, where he's checking out the features of the Chevy Chase Skatepark. Join American street skateboarder Joey Brezinski in Los Angeles, California, where he's checking out the features of the Chevy Chase Skatepark alongside his trusty skate buddy, Rip.

programme.title: Bells Beach 2018
programme.desc: Surfing luminaries of Australia weigh in on Mick Fanning's legacy and size up some spots on Victoria’s coast. Join legendary surfer Mick Fanning and the people closest to him in Bells Beach, Australia, as they celebrate his retirement. Then hear from the local surfers as they weigh in on Fanning’s legacy and size up the most ferocious surf spots in Victoria.

programme.title: A battle between brothers
programme.desc: Watch as the two Driftbrothers go head-to-head in Poland for a tight race. Elias and Johannes Hountondji have a little fun at home in Germany before round four in Poland, reminding them why they love the sport. Then watch as the two go head-to-head in a tight race.
